192.168.27.28/27


       192.168.27.28  => 11000000.10101000.00011011.00011100
/27 => 255.255.255.224=> 11111111.11111111.11111111.11100000


11000000.10101000.00011011.000 11100
11111111.11111111.11111111.111 00000

Network Address:

11000000.10101000.00011011.000 00000=>192.168.27.0
27 - 24(Class C) => 3 bits are borrowed from host portion

Number of Subnets possible => 2^3 => 8

Number of host bits remaining available => 8(default) - 3(subnetbits) => 5 bits

Number of Hosts possbile in each subnet => (2^5)-2 => 32-2 => 30

Firt Host Address => 11000000.10101000.00011011.000 00001 => 192.168.27.1

Last Host Address => 11000000.10101000.00011011.000 11110 => 192.168.27.30

Previous Subnet Address:

11000000.10101000.00011011.000 11011 => 192.168.27.27

Next Subnet Address:

11000000.10101000.00011011.000 11101 => 192.168.27.29


Broadcast Address:
11000000.10101000.00011011.000 11111 => 192.168.27.31

Previous IP Address to the current host(IP) address:


11000000.10101000.00011011.00011011 => 192.168.27.27


Next IP Address to the current host(IP) address:

 11000000.10101000.00011011.00011101 => 192.168.27.29
